metadata.title: CVE-2020-35501 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernels implementation of audit rules, wherea syscall can unexpectedly not be correctly not be logged by the auditsubsystem

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').
linux-aws package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').

linux-gke package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm package in noble is affected and may need fixing.

linux-raspi-realtime package in realtime/noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-realtime package in realtime/noble is affected and may need fixing.
